name.baseName: North China Wheat ; Hebei Wheat Production
华北小麦; 河北小麦生产

dataSetInformation.common:generalComment: Life cycle assessment (LCA) method was used to examine the environmental impact of wheat-maize rotation system emphasizing double high in Quzhou County. The LCA considered the entire system, from raw material extraction to grain production, in arable farming to produce 1 ton each of winter wheat and summer maize. Results indicated that double high agriculture could improve the yield of winter wheat and summer maize by 6.84% and 9.80% respectively, while decreasing the demand for non-renewable energy resources by 13.18% for winter wheat, and 17.45% for summer maize. In the double high production system, N and P fertilizer application was decreased by 5.23% and 7.79% for winter wheat production, and 2.37% and 56.54% for summer maize production. Less use of fertilizers in the winter wheat-summer maize production system decreased global warming, acidification, and aquatic eutrophication potentials. In the double high system, farmers decreased pesticide use by 10.64% for winter wheat and 19.57% for summer maize, thus reducing their potential evaporation, leaching, and surface run-off to environment. In addition, the double high agriculture decreased the heavy metal release to soil as a result of lower use of P fertilizers. In conclusion, the double high agriculture could decrease global warming, acidification, aquatic eutrophication, human toxicity, aquatic eco-toxicity, and soil eco-toxicity potentials as well as life cycle environmental impact index of winter wheat-summer maize production system. The practice in Quzhou County showed that double high system of winter wheat-summer maize production could increase food production while protecting environmental quality and conserving natural resources, and is thus applicable to North China Plain.

采用生命周期评价（LCA）方法，考察衢州县双高小麦-玉米轮作制度对环境的影响。 LCA 考虑了耕作中从原材料提取到粮食生产的整个系统，以生产冬小麦和夏玉米各 1 吨。 结果表明，双高农业可使冬小麦和夏玉米产量分别提高6.84%和9.80%，同时减少对不可再生能源的需求，其中冬小麦减少13.18%，夏玉米减少17.45%。 双高生产体系中，冬小麦氮磷肥施用量分别减少5.23%和7.79%，夏玉米产量分别减少2.37%和56.54%。 冬小麦-夏玉米生产系统中肥料的减少使用减少了全球变暖、酸化和水生富营养化的可能性。 在双高制度下，农民将冬小麦农药使用量减少了10.64%，夏玉米农药使用量减少了19.57%，从而减少了潜在的蒸发、淋溶和地表径流对环境的影响。 此外，双高农业由于减少了磷肥的使用，减少了土壤重金属的释放。 综上所述，双高农业可以降低全球变暖、酸化、水生富营养化、人体毒性、水生生态毒性、土壤生态毒性潜力以及冬小麦-夏玉米生产系统的生命周期环境影响指数。 曲周县的实践表明，冬小麦—夏玉米双高制可以在提高粮食产量的同时，保护环境质量，节约自然资源，适合华北平原。

time.common:timeRepresentativenessDescription: The inventory analysis compiled all resources needed and all emissions that were released by the specific system under investigation and relates them to the deﬁned functional unit (ISO, 1998). Data on double high production system were collected in a survey of 105 farmers, and the data on conventional farming system were obtained through a survey of 90 farmers from 2009 to 2011
清单分析编制了所调查的特定系统所需的所有资源和所释放的所有排放量，并将它们与定义的功能单元联系起来（ISO，1998）。清单分析编制了特定系统所需的所有资源和所释放的所有排放量 正在调查并将它们与定义的功能单元联系起来（ISO，1998）。 双高生产制度的数据是通过对105名农户的调查获得的，常规耕作制度的数据是通过2009年至2011年对90名农户的调查获得的

technology.technologyDescriptionAndIncludedProcesse: The study was carried out according to the International Organization for Standardization (ISO 14040) and the Society for Environmental Toxicology and Chemistry (SETAC) (Consoli et al., 1993; ISO, 2006). The LCA tool is accomplished in four phases: (i) goal and scope definition, (ii) life cycle inventory analysis, (iii) life cycle impact assessment, and (iv) life cycle interpretation. The calculations were implemented by using Microsoft Excel.
这项研究是根据国际标准化组织(ISO 14040)和环境毒理学和化学学会进行的(Consoli等人，1993年;ISO, 2006)。LCA工具分四个阶段完成:(i)目标和范围定义，(ii)生命周期清单分析，(iii)生命周期影响评估，以及(iv)生命周期解释。计算采用Microsoft Excel软件实现。
technology.technologicalApplicability: The Hebei Wheat Production process under the double high agriculture system is designated for the production of winter wheat and summer maize, aiming to increase crop yields, conserve natural resources, and reduce the environmental impact of agricultural practices. This system is particularly developed for the North China Plain and is applicable to regions that would benefit from sustainable agricultural practices that promote higher yields and reduced reliance on non-renewable resources.
河北小麦生产的双高农业系统专为生产冬小麦和夏玉米而设计，旨在提高作物产量、节约自然资源和减少农业活动对环境的影响。该系统专为华北平原开发，并适用于将从可持续农业实践中受益的地区，这些实践促进了更高的产量和对不可再生资源的减少依赖。

LCIMethodAndAllocation.deviationsFromLCIMethodApproaches: The goal and scope definition ofan LCA provides a description of the product system in terms of the system boundaries and a functional unit. The system boundaries of this LCA are from mineral and fossil fuel cradle to farm gate, analogously to the life cycle assessment study of Li et al. (2012).
LCA 的目标和范围定义根据系统边界和功能单元提供了产品系统的描述。 该LCA的系统边界是从矿物和化石燃料的摇篮到农场大门，类似于Li等人的生命周期评估研究。

dataSourcesTreatmentAndRepresentativenes.dataTreatmentAndExtrapolationsPrinciples: amount of fossil energy used in direct forms (e.g. diesel) was inferred from local experts and farmer interviews, while indirect forms (e.g. fossil energy consumed during fertilizer/pesticide production) were calculated from the consumption of primary energy factors in China (Wang et al., 2002). The emissions such as CO, NOx, SO2, CH4,N2O and CO2, due to energy consumption in the agriculture material production were calculated with SimaPro 7.1, which is the most widely used LCA software (Liang et al., 2009). In arable farming, ammonia volatilization was determined from nitrogen fertilizers using rates of 23% for winter wheat and 26% for summermaize. Nitrate leachingwas estimated as 14% nitrogen input for winter wheat and 16% for summer maize (Ju et al., 2009,Cheng et al. 2011). Direct N2O emissions come from the application of inorganic nitrogen, organic fertilizer, and incorporation of crop residues (1.25% of the N released as N2O). In addition to the direct emissions, induced emissions fromammonia and nitrate losses were considered. The respective factors were 1% for ammonia-N and 2.5% for nitrate-N (Nemecek et al., 2008). Three paths of P loss to water were included, namely run-off (as phosphate), erosion (as phosphorus) to rivers, and leaching to ground water (as phosphate). In this study, phosphorus loss was calculated as 0.2% of inputs for both inorganic and organic phosphorus sources (Wang et al., 2007). Heavy metal (Cu, Zn, Cd, Pb) losses were assessed from inpute output balance. Inputs of heavy metal were from fertilizers, irrigation and pesticides. The outputs were in the form of harvested grains, erosion and leaching, as returning ofcrop residues to field is a common practice in the North China plain (Cui et al., 2008). The inputs and outputs of heavy metal in the winter wheat-summer maize production system were estimated according to Xiao et al. (2004), Xiao et al. (2005) and Chen et al. (2006). Pesticide losses to air were determined using a standard residue rate of10% per unit weight of pesticides, 1% to freshwater, and 43% to soil (Wang et al., 2007).

直接形式（例如柴油）使用的化石能源数量是根据当地专家和农民访谈推断的，而间接形式（例如化肥/农药生产过程中消耗的化石能源）则是根据中国一次能源要素的消耗量计算的（Wang等人） .，2002）。 利用最广泛使用的LCA软件SimaPro 7.1计算了农业物资生产中因能源消耗而产生的CO、NOx、SO2、CH4、N2O和CO2等排放量（Liang等，2009）。 在耕作中，氨挥发是由氮肥测定的，冬小麦的氮肥用量为23%，夏玉米的氮肥用量为26%。 据估计，冬小麦的氮输入量为 14%，夏玉米的氮输入量为 16%（Ju 等人，2009 年；Cheng 等人，2011 年）。 N2O 的直接排放来自无机氮、有机肥的施用以及作物残茬的掺入（以 N2O 形式释放的氮的 1.25%）。 除了直接排放外，还考虑了氨和硝酸盐损失引起的排放。 氨氮的相应因子为 1%，硝酸盐氮的因子为 2.5%（Nemecek 等，2008）。 包括磷流失到水的三种途径，即径流（作为磷酸盐）、侵蚀（作为磷）到河流以及淋滤到地下水（作为磷酸盐）。 在这项研究中，磷损失计算为无机和有机磷源投入量的 0.2%（Wang 等，2007）。 重金属（铜、锌、镉、铅）损失根据投入产出平衡进行评估。 重金属的输入来自化肥、灌溉和农药。 产出以收获的谷物、侵蚀和淋滤的形式出现，因为将作物残茬还田是华北平原的常见做法（Cui et al., 2008）。 根据肖等的研究，估算了冬小麦-夏玉米生产系统中重金属的投入和产出。 (2004)，肖等人。 （2005）和陈等人。 （2006）。 空气中农药损失的标准残留率为每单位重量农药 10%、淡水中 1%、土壤中 43%（Wang 等人，2007 年）。

referenceToDataSource.common:shortDescription: Wang C, Li X, Gong T, et al. Life cycle assessment of wheat-maize rotation system emphasizing high crop yield and high resource use efficiency in Quzhou County[J]. Journal of Cleaner Production, 2014, 68: 56-63.

Wang C, Li X, Gong T, et al. Life cycle assessment of wheat-maize rotation system emphasizing high crop yield and high resource use efficiency in Quzhou County[J]. Journal of Cleaner Production, 2014, 68: 56-63.

dataSourcesTreatmentAndRepresentativenes.samplingProcedure: The inventory analysis compiled all resources needed and all emissions that were released by the specific system under investigation and relates them to the deﬁned functional unit (ISO, 1998). Data on double high production system were collected in a survey of 105 farmers, and the data on conventional farming system were obtained through a survey of 90 farmers from 2009 to 2011
清单分析汇集了所调查的特定系统所需的所有资源和所有排放量，并将它们与定义的功能单元联系起来（ISO，1998）。 双高生产制度的数据是通过对105名农户的调查获得的，常规耕作制度的数据是通过2009年至2011年对90名农户的调查获得的
dataSourcesTreatmentAndRepresentativenes.useAdviceForDataSet: When applying LCA data from the Hebei Wheat Production, users should consider the system boundaries from mineral and fossil fuel extraction to the farm gate. It is crucial to include the adjustments made in the double high production system, such as reduced fertilizer and pesticide use, and the consequent changes in yield and resource consumption. The data relating to energy and material flows, direct and indirect emissions, and heavy metal content should be handled with care considering the functional unit of 1 ton of winter wheat and 1 ton of summer maize production. External factors such as local climate and farmer practices may influence the results, so appropriate regional adjustments may be necessary when applying this data to different contexts.
在应用河北小麦生产的 LCA 数据时，用户应该考虑从矿物和化石燃料开采到农场大门的系统边界。重要的是要纳入双高生产系统的调整，如减少肥料和农药使用，以及因此产量和资源消耗的变化。相关能源和物料流、直接和间接排放以及重金属含量的数据应考虑每生产1吨冬小麦和1吨夏玉米的功能单元，谨慎处理。诸如当地气候和农民实践等外部因素可能会影响结果，因此在将这些数据应用到不同情境时，可能需要进行适当的区域调整。

review.common:reviewDetails: Inventory: The internal review was done by several iteration steps concerning raw data validation, raw data documentation, representativity, completeness and consistency of modelling with regard to ISO 14040 and 14044.
清单： 内部审查通过几个迭代步骤完成，涉及原始数据验证、原始数据记录、代表性、完整性、与 ISO 14040 和 14044 有关的建模的一致性。

publicationAndOwnership.common:licenseType: Free of charge for all users and uses

referenceToFlowDataSet.common:shortDescription: Energy, gross calorific value, in biomass, primary forest
